org.hps.detector.ecal

Class GVector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.detector.ecal.GVector

  • class GVector
extends Object
    Define a vector in (XYZ) coordinate system as a geometrical object. This class is similar to HepVector

      • RotateBy

        public GVector RotateBy(double alpha,
                        double betta,
                        double gamma)
        Rotate this vector by (alpha, betta, gamma) rotation angles (Rz-alpha,Ry-beta,Rx-gamma)
        Parameters:
        alpha - rotation around Z axis
        beta - rotation around Y axis
        gamma - rotation around X axis
        Returns:
        new GVector=this vector rotated by (alpha, betta, gamma)
